class.name: reassemble_controllers/JointVelocityExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on joint velocities to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: reassemble_controllers/JointPositionExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on joint positions to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianPoseExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian poses to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianVelocityExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian velocities to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: reassemble_controllers/ElbowExampleController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian poses and elbow to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: reassemble_controllers/ModelExampleController
class.description: A controller that evaluates and prints the dynamic model of Franka

class.name: reassemble_controllers/JointImpedanceExampleController
class.description: A controller that tracks a cartesian path with a joint impedance controller that compensates coriolis torques. The torque commands are compared to measured torques in Console outputs.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianImpedanceExampleController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters and the equilibrium pose can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure and an interactive marker respectively.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianImpedanceControllerDampingRatio
class.description: Improved version of the default cartesian impedance controller. A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters and the equilibrium pose can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure and an interactive marker respectively.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianVariableImpedanceControllerDampingRatio
class.description: Improved version of the default cartesian impedance controller. A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters and the equilibrium pose can be modified with the corresponding rostopics.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianVariableImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters, the equilibrium pose, desired velocities and desired wrench can be modified with the corresponding rostopics.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianVariableImpedanceControllerPassive
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters, the equilibrium pose, desired velocities and desired wrench can be modified with the corresponding rostopics. Energy-tank based passivity ensures passivity of the controller.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianVariableImpedanceControllerPassiveMultidim
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters, the equilibrium pose, desired velocities and desired wrench can be modified with the corresponding rostopics. Energy-tank based passivity ensures passivity of the controller. Using vector instead of scalar value allows to adjust compliance in specific directions.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianVariableImpedanceControllerPassiveDRMultidim
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters, the equilibrium pose, desired velocities and desired wrench can be modified with the corresponding rostopics. Energy-tank based passivity ensures passivity of the controller. Damping ratio can be adjusted (default: 1). Using vector instead of scalar value allows to adjust compliance in specific directions.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/ForceExampleController
class.description: A PI controller that applies a force corresponding to a user-provided desired mass in the z axis. The desired mass value can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/DualArmCartesianImpedanceExampleController
class.description: A controller that renders Cartesian impedance based tracking of separate target poses for 2 panda arms.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/TeleopJointPDExampleController
class.description: A PD controller that tracks position and velocity of the leader arm and applies it to the follower arm. It also applies force-feedback to the leader arm.

class.name: reassemble_controllers/CartesianVICTeleop
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters, the equilibrium pose, desired velocities and desired wrench can be modified with the corresponding rostopics. Energy-tank based passivity ensures passivity of the controller. Can be uses with teleoperation to allow humans for applying corrections.
